entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WebAssembly Hosted App: Debugger Jumping(double cliking) from Error list to source code at incorrect location #36423
  • Cannot get HubCallerContext.User to get Set #36421
  • Add .ctor(string) to FromHeaderAttribute and FromQueryAttribute #36418
  • Support more ProblemDetails Titles out-of-the-box for Results.Problem() #36417
  • WebApplicationBuilder does not canonicalize the --contentRoot argument #36416
  • Support BindAsync() without ParameterInfo for Minimal APIs #36415
  • Minimal API endpoints do not appear in OpenAPI if WithGroupName() is used #36414
  • Minimal APIs route constraints break OpenAPI requests #36413
  • OpenAPI documentation is incorrect when using custom TryParse() binding with Minimal APIs #36412
  • Passing null to NavigationManager.GetUriWithQueryParameter requires a cast #36411
  • Issues building from source. #36410
  • Analyzer: Warn when passing a Task<T> or ValueTask<T> to Minimal API Results.* methods #36408
  • Improve ccompression of RequestImageFileAsync #36407
  • Startup regression: fortunes #36401
  • Blazor Wasm can't read Azure Storage Tables directly, it needs azure functions or controllers. #36399

Closed

  • Startup regression: json #36388
  • Startup improvement: json #36402
  • Startup regression: endpoint, https, plaintext #36323
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #36387
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException: The client has disconnected An operation was attempted on a nonexistent network connection. #36375

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Invalidate Cached WASM Auth Token on Authentication State Change #36426
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Bump path-parse from 1.0.6 to 1.0.7 in /src/Components/Web.JS #36425
    area-blazor
  • Test in manual internal builds #36424
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] Add CODEOWNERS #36422
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Remove Dependabot `reviewers` #36420
    area-infrastructure
  • Unquarantine Settings_MaxConcurrentStreamsPost_Server #36409
    area-runtime
  • Simplify Guid reading code in DataProtection #36403
    area-dataprotection
  • [main] [release/6.0] Initial Bootstrap v4 SxS support #36397
    area-identity

Merged

  • Bump path-parse from 1.0.6 to 1.0.7 in /src/Components/Web.JS #35225
    area-blazor, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Ensure _Dumps artifacts aren't empty #36419
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Ensure _Dumps artifacts aren't empty #36400
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [Backport][SPA] Update SPA submodule (#36389) #36398
    auto-merge
  • Implement 100 Continue for HTTP/3 #36168
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Implement 100 Continue for HTTP/3 #36395
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Added coverage for developer exception page #35786
    area-runtime, tell-mode
  • Honor sliding expiration in the security stamp validator #36394
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/3.1] Handle shortened JSON file in `dotnet openapi` #36362
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, feature-openapi
